name: MapYourVote
tag_list: social-polling, polling, voting, social-voting, social-polling-system, social-voting-system, polling-system, voting-system, electronic-voting-system, website, social-networking
overview:
MapYourVote.com allows you to ask questions (polls) and let the world answer. The results are then presented using a fun, fully interactive thematic map, allowing you to quickly obtain a better understanding of opinions across the globe.

You can also narrow your result set by zooming into subregions or by adding demographic filters (i.e. filter by gender, age, location, political stance, religion, etc.). The comment and discussion section associated with each poll, is directly linked to the map. If you zoom into a sub region or apply a filter, the page updates to show comments and discussions from that region and demographic.

MapYourVote provides an unprecedented medium for ideas and questions to flow between one side of the world to the other. Use it for fun, use it for business, use it to stay connected, and us it for Free.

We welcome you to share your knowledge, and your curiosity! After all, it’s Your Vote, Your World.
